name: brosaurus
text: You know someone's from beyond circumstances when the very mention of their infancy causes them to seize up and go blank. This is a tragedy.

name: ferdinand
text: my god, if i had a nickel for every time i said that...

name: saru
text: ... Well? How many nickels would you have!? Don't leave us hangin' here bro!

name: semiquaver
text: ...you would spend all day saying that and receiving nickels as a result

name: geysershitdick
text: The nipples you've seen must have come from hell of circumstances.

name: carlyle
text: Oh god .

name: farqussus
text: I think you mean the drawing of a bug does not in any way look like a nipple.

name: darkwaffle
text: The last panel is so wonderfully twisted. My jaw literally dropped.

name: soticoto
text:
Instant 5 for that alone.
And a chubby for you.

name: c4keman
text: Never has a webcomic caused my heart to sink.  Figures Roast Beef's childhood flashbacks would do it to me... :(

name: alejandroadam
text: is future dead person a cat and girl referance? probably not.

name: rotating-dog
text: Thats what I thought.

name: rotating-dog
text: Clarification - i DID think it was a reference. Damn, I hate this no editing your posts thing. sorry people

name: geysershitdick
text:
It's a reference to the common baby onesies that say "Future scientist" or "Future teacher" or whatever.

Ecamples:

http://www.littlebigboys.com/index.asp?PageAction=VIEWPROD&ProdID=8
http://capitolshoppingmall.com/Merchant2/merchant.mvc?Screen=PROD&Store_Code=CSM&Product_Code=KTFPO
http://littlelefties.com/Merchant2/merchant.mvc?Screen=PROD&Store_Code=LL&Product_Code=FF_O

name: geysershitdick
text: ah fuck it. just take my word for it. or google "future onesie"

name: mercuri0us
text: who buys this stuff???

name: greenkoolayd
text: your mom

name: mercuri0us
text: I wish, no-one would have fucked with me at kindergarten if I'd worn those.

name: mangtastic
text: You wore onesies in kindergarten??

name: bluemoon72
text: I wouldn't buy that fake punk bullcrap, but T-Shirt Hell used to have one with a camo print and a helicopter, with a M*A*S*H-style font that said "Yeah, I was in the shit."  If I ever have a baby, I would totally get that for him or her.

name: wehavemagnums
text: Beef's...

name: overmedicated
text: I hate myself.

name: rowboat
text: Folks are thrilled that you hate yourself.

name: heccibiggs
text: Assetbar users have a strong sense of self-flagellation.

name: c_dizzle
text: When I was 10 my dad accidentally called me "Tim" when saying goodnight to me. There isn't a Tim in my ENTIRE family. I have no idea where he got that.

name: goatmasterflash
text: maybe Tim was the boy your dad was seein' on the side. Or maybe it was just an honest mistake.

name: greenkoolayd
text: what does that have to do with anything?

name: thicker
text: If I ever go to a shrink the first thing I will do is show them this strip and say "my problem is that I think panel 3 is extremely goddamn hilarious, please help me"

name: syrinx
text: the last panel is probably the saddest thing I've ever seen.  Also, beef had hair?

name: i_love_kate
text: It's less worrying if you think that it is hair, yes. I personally believe it to be something somewhat... darker.

name: benthecartoon
text:
I was just thinking the exact same thing. I was frightened.

"Is that hair? Or.... Oh my God..."

name: nutmeg
text: "future dead person" haha man i would put all my children in that thing it is hilarious.

name: ocarinak
text: What makes this is Beef's expressions. All extremely giddy line eyes in panel four, all completely frozen in panel 7.

name: deusoma
text: Yessir, that horribly blank look as he spirals back down Awful Memory Lane makes the strip.

name: zapatos
text: The action lines, as though he were recently pole axed.

name: tinhand
text:
FUTURE DEAD PERSON. As a shirt.
Seriously, I would buy it. It's funny because it's true, we are all future dead people.

name: evolume
text: A comment left by evolume was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Conn, smilebuddha, Darthemed)

name: alejandroadam
text: go to catandgirl.com they sell the shirt there.

name: neoboman
text: While I find most of these things funny, this is one of the only ones that made me laugh out loud, thanks to the last panel.

name: deancain29
text: Onstad's psychosis is clearly emerging.

name: cousinted
text: The cat's girlfriend accidently undoes years of painful repression.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: cousinted
text: I don't like where that arrow's pointing

name: connellingus
text: I e-mailed Chris to tell him that I would totally buy a "Future Dead Person" baby onesie, and lamentably he replied that it was pretty unlikely that they would produce it.

name: asumoactingbig
text: "Pretty unlikely" is no excuse not to try

name: bhlaab
text: this is the best one

name: _cheesekayke
text: This might be the saddest Achewood strip of all time...

text: A comment left by asumoactingbig was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Unfun, luckypyjamas, aHatOfPig)

text: This is my single favorite one-off achewood strip. Just sayin'.

name: clever-nickname
text: This one went from funny to funny and depressing.

name: nicolae
text: Check and mate, Molly.

name: johnmatrix
text: Is that a piece of poop at the bottom of the bag?

name: nicolae
text: It's his foot

name: johnmatrix
text: Ah, I see it now.

name: quantumcasaba
text: Maybe tail?

name: shemmjacc
text: I am simultaneously laughing at crying so much it hurts

name: rachel
text:
crinkle crink crink crinkle crink

that is what did it for me

that is what did me in

name: f1shst1ck
text: god, that is positively heart wrenching

name: luckypyjamas
text:
beef's mouth in panel three

and four

name: quantumcasaba
text:
It took me awhile to realize for whom they were buying baby clothes.
In my defense, I read this for the first time two months ago so I missed a lot of the strip-to-life involvement.
Yet this is my shame.
Gub.

name: lordhumungus
text:
This strip explains more about Beef than all others combined.

I include all future strips in this sweeping generalization.

name: nikopol
text: I particularly love the way that Beef's entire body locks up as the memories come back to him.

name: notthatyoudknow
text: Molly takes offense at the second one since she has been a dead person before.

name: dropkickpikachu
text: As a counterpoint, so has Beef.

name: wittyname
text:
Molly does have more experience being dead, but Beef has died more than her.

Either way, no one wins.

name: zapatos
text: They are both alive now, so they both have won.

name: juanclaudius
text:
This was my first. It's so beautiful.

Also, baby Beef has hell of gangly legs.

name: chewy
text: Hell of sad and poignant, yo.

name: c_dizzle
text:
I think I saw that last panel on Animal Precinct.

And if I ever become crazy enough to think I can rear a child, I'm definitely buying it a "Future Dead Person" onesie.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
five'd for 'future dead person.'
and..the horrible flashback to Beef's kid-hood.

name: gussiejives
text: It's a step up from Dempster's I suppose.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Roast Beef: TiVo
Pat: Garbagemen.

name: mangtastic
text: The only reason I can actually read Pat's blogs is that I know he is a fictional character.  If he were a real person I would be too disgusted.

name: redmange
text: There needs to be a onesie section in the shop.  Not of these onesie's.  Just onesie versions of Roast Beef's self derogatory shirts.  I for one would happily buy a -I am the guy who sucks.  Also, I have depression.- Onesie for my child, and let them sport it as I wear my "GOD DAMMIT WHAT AM I GOING TO DO ABOUT MY PROBLEMS" T.

name: charchar
text: The infant Beef cries for satirical novelists .

name: lechatnoir
text: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z3nnOMFm1tQ

name: atticusonline
text: Molly! Why did you ask that!? You know better!

name: tonyhighwind
text: She was caught up in the moment.  She wished she had the words back the second they left her mouth.

name: endsmouth
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: inthetunk
text: "So what if ___ is food, I ain't buggin" has entered the vernacular.

name: gournal
text: When, specifically, would be a good time to use that?

name: mrectomy
text: Leaving a comment here so I can come back to it easily. I'm probably gonna get a tattoo of Beef holding the 'future dead person' onesie. That's just too good.

name: johnmatrix
text: Beef's hair doesn't really look like hair. It looks more like a pile of sludge on his head.

name: tarranon
text:
This strip makes me feel claustrophobic and short of breath at the last panel.
Every.
Single.
Time.

name: carlyle
text: I realized Beef is techinally bald.

name: hausea
text: I've read this strip so many times and this is the first time I noticed that baby Cassandra is not in fact in the rain but merely squirming on the wood floor.

name: greenkoolayd
text: PANEL 6: oh no you dont, molly.  oh now you dont.

name: sarsbar
text: Oh god... this is some seriously depressing shit.  I need a drink.

name: dusty
text: This makes me picture a PSA where one of the cast of buffy the vampire slayer is all serious like "There are lots of things you should store in a sack, a baby isn't one of them. Don't store babies in a sack."
